tags.string: {string} config.baseUrl - The base URL to apply to API requests.
tags.name: config.baseUrl
tags.description: • The base URL to apply to API requests.

tags.string: {string} config.id - The name of the topic or subscription.
tags.name: config.id
tags.description: • The name of the topic or subscription.

tags.html:
var pubsub = gcloud.pubsub({
projectId: 'grape-spaceship-123',
keyFilename: '/path/to/keyfile.json'
});

var topic = pubsub.topic('my-topic');
// topic.iam

var subscription = pubsub.subscription('my-subscription');
// subscription.iam

description.full:
IAM (Identity and Access Management)
allows you to set permissions on invidual resources and offers a wider range
of roles: editor, owner, publisher, subscriber, and viewer. This gives you
greater flexibility and allows you to set more fine-grained access control.

For example:

  • Grant access on a per-topic or per-subscription basis, rather than for
    the whole Cloud project.
  • Grant access with limited capabilities, such as to only publish messages
    to a topic, or to only to consume messages from a subscription, but not
    to delete the topic or subscription.

The IAM access control features described in this document are Beta,
including the API methods to get and set IAM policies, and to test IAM
permissions. Google Cloud Pub/Sub's use of IAM features is not covered by any
SLA or deprecation policy, and may be subject to backward-incompatible
changes.
description.summary:
IAM (Identity and Access Management)
allows you to set permissions on invidual resources and offers a wider range
of roles: editor, owner, publisher, subscriber, and viewer. This gives you
greater flexibility and allows you to set more fine-grained access control.
description.body:
For example:

  • Grant access on a per-topic or per-subscription basis, rather than for
    the whole Cloud project.
  • Grant access with limited capabilities, such as to only publish messages
    to a topic, or to only to consume messages from a subscription, but not
    to delete the topic or subscription.

The IAM access control features described in this document are Beta,
including the API methods to get and set IAM policies, and to test IAM
permissions. Google Cloud Pub/Sub's use of IAM features is not covered by any
SLA or deprecation policy, and may be subject to backward-incompatible
changes.

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request.
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request.

tags.string:
topic.iam.getPolicy(function(err, policy, apiResponse) {});

subscription.iam.getPolicy(function(err, policy, apiResponse) {});
{array=} policy.bindings - Bindings associate members with roles.
tags.name: policy.bindings

tags.string: {object[]=} policy.rules - Rules to be applied to the policy.
tags.name: policy.rules
tags.description: • Rules to be applied to the policy.

tags.string: {string=} policy.etag - Etags are used to perform a read-modify-write.
tags.name: policy.etag
tags.description: • Etags are used to perform a read-modify-write.

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request.
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request.

tags.html:
var myPolicy = {
bindings: [
{
role: 'roles/pubsub.subscriber',
members: ['serviceAccount:myotherproject@appspot.gserviceaccount.com']
}
]
};

topic.iam.setPolicy(myPolicy, function(err, policy, apiResponse) {});

subscription.iam.setPolicy(myPolicy, function(err, policy, apiResponse) {});

tags.string: {string|string[]} permissions - The permission(s) to test for.
tags.name: permissions

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request.
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request.

tags.string:
{array} callback.permissions - A subset of permissions that the caller
    is allowed
tags.name: callback.permissions
tags.description: • A subset of permissions that the caller is allowed

tags.html:
//-
// Test a single permission.
//-
var test = 'pubsub.topics.update';

topic.iam.testPermissions(test, function(err, permissions, apiResponse) {
console.log(permissions);
// {
// "pubsub.topics.update": true
// }
});

//-
// Test several permissions at once.
//-
var tests = [
'pubsub.subscriptions.consume',
'pubsub.subscriptions.update'
];

subscription.iam.testPermissions(tests, function(err, permissions) {
console.log(permissions);
// {
// "pubsub.subscriptions.consume": true,
// "pubsub.subscriptions.update": false
// }
});

description.full:
Test a set of permissions for a resource.

Permissions with wildcards such as * or storage.* are not allowed.
description.summary: Test a set of permissions for a resource.
description.body: Permissions with wildcards such as * or storage.* are not allowed.
